aboutPage.title: About Belgium
aboutPage.introduction: Welcome to our portfolio site dedicated to the beautiful country of Belgium. Discover its rich history, diverse culture, and stunning landmarks.

sections.heading: History
sections.content: Belgium has a fascinating history, from its origins as a collection of medieval principalities to its role in the European Union today. It gained independence in 1830 and has since grown into a thriving constitutional monarchy.

sections.heading: Culture
sections.content: Known for its diversity, Belgium has three official languages: Dutch, French, and German. The country is also famous for its delicious cuisine, including waffles, chocolate, and beer.

sections.heading: Landmarks
sections.content: Belgium is home to breathtaking landmarks like the Grand Place in Brussels, the medieval city of Bruges, and the iconic Atomium.

sections.heading: Fun Facts
sections.content: Did you know that Belgium has more castles per square kilometer than any other country in the world? It's also where the saxophone was invented!

callToAction.text: Want to learn more? Explore the other pages to dive deeper into Belgium's wonders.
